ctx: intros f g x l H1 H2.
intros f g x l H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K f, g : K -> V x : K l : V H1 : forall t : K, f t = g t H2 : is_derive f x l Unable to unify "f ?M2365 = g ?M2365" with "exists eps : posreal, forall y : AbsRing_UniformSpace K, ball x eps y -> (fun t : K => f t = g t) y".

ctx: intros f g x l H1 H2.
